title: New Message Screen Dark And Filled With Coding

If I click on each element I can delete them and get back to a blank page. Also, it appears, thankfully, I am sending and receiving emails as normal. My email domain is with Go Daddy and I do use Owl so don't know if that has any effect. I would appreciate any help. Thank You!

Then I noticed a couple of other emails that mention an attachment, there is nothing there.

Is there some setting I accidentally made?
